contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 6, 1999 D Whitburn Invitation Contest
Whitburn Invitation Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
whitburn-invitation-contest
None
Entertainments Contest
Whitburn Academy Best section 1 band - Kingdom Brass. Best section 2 band - Johnstone. Best section 3 band - Tullis Russell. Best instrumentalist - David MacLeod (Selkirk) Best soloist - Pauline Murphy (soprano) Kirkintilloch. Best cornet - Kevin Smith (Newtongrange). Best euphonium - Neil Philp (Newtongrange). Best trombones and basses - Kirkintilloch. Best percussion - Johnstone. 28th annual contest. 18 bands competed.
Oct. 9, 2011, 5:26 a.m. July 11, 2015, 9:47 p.m.
1 Kirkintilloch Band Allan Ramsay
2 Unison Kinneil Band Chris Bradley
3 Newtongrange Band Daniel Price
4 Johnstone Band Raymond Tennant
